data.text: @rexntsane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT I have told you already if you don't Gerrit forget about it. Kindergarten mentality
@zillemaimane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT You still didnâ€™t say what you want to do with this information

@rexntsane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT You came too late into the conversation and been selective of context I was raising. Your focused too much on monetary value. Another thing I want to ascertain if land was donated,
@BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @_cosatu pila pila guys what are doing with your members contribution

@zillemaimane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT The comparison there was with the R430M spent on sanitizing empty schools during lockdown,which we all know that the money was stolen by the ANC thieves.
But the evidence for the R200M spent by the union solidarity are there for everyone to see.

@rexntsane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT Braaah please relax, follow my timeline on the issue. I said indeed its great work however my concern is the 200m figure which does not add up. It seems the cost is way above of what they are reporting to mislead and create an impression that government projects are over prized
@zillemaimane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT Say,you get a proof,what are you gonna do with it?

@rexntsane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT Relax just answer my question, I'm not in your level of insult as it shows your maturity level are of a Parrot. So when department of education builds a school for 400m is not building country. I'm not gullible like you

@zillemaimane @kmphathe @bfutsh @peeceepro @Vuyani03 @BonganiBaloyiBB @solidariteit @SolidareIT We are celebrating a great achievement,unity,good use of money,vision and building of our country, and you come to ask a stupid and irrelevant question,for what?Who and what are you in the equation?
